subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Families and Family Life
Badminton
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Bob Malaythong came to America to study, to make money and send it home. Now the 27-year-old who never had a childhood will be smacking shuttlecocks behind his back and over his head in Beijing.
snippet: Bob Malaythong came to America to study, to make money and send it home. Now the 27-year-old who never had a childhood will be smacking shuttlecocks behind his back and over his head in Beijing.
